product_overview: A full-stack food delivery application enabling users to browse restaurants, manage menus, place orders, and make payments, with robust features for restaurant owners and administrators alongside security best practices.
core_goals: Provide a seamless and secure user authentication and authorization system.
Enable restaurant owners to manage their restaurant listings and menus effectively.
Offer customers comprehensive browsing, searching, and filtering of restaurants and menu items.
Allow users to add items to a shopping cart, manage quantities, and place orders.
Integrate a reliable payment gateway (Chapa) for secure transactions.
Provide an admin dashboard to manage users, restaurants, orders, and analytics efficiently.
Ensure security best practices including JWT authentication, input validation, rate limiting, and secure password handling.
key_features: Complete user authentication with registration, login, and JWT token-based authorization.
Restaurant management including listing, details, and owner dashboards.
Menu management supporting full CRUD operations for menu items.
Shopping cart functionality with add, remove, and quantity update capabilities.
Order processing system covering checkout to order history and tracking.
Integration of Chapa payment gateway for online payments.
Admin dashboard facilitating management of users, restaurants, orders, support, and analytics.
Restaurant analytics and reporting with review management.
Advanced search and filtering mechanisms for better user experience.
Comprehensive security measures including rate limiting, input sanitization, and secure HTTP headers.
Home page composed of promotional sections, restaurant categories, and popular listings.
Promo code system offering discounts and special offers.
user_flow_summary: User registers or logs in, receiving JWT tokens for authenticated access.
User browses restaurants using search and filters, viewing detailed restaurant and menu pages.
Restaurant owners login to access their restaurant dashboard, manage restaurant info, menus, and view analytics.
Users add menu items to their cart, modify quantities, and proceed to checkout.
During checkout, users select payment methods integrating with the Chapa payment gateway.
Orders are processed and users can track order status and review history.
Admin logs in to manage users, restaurants, orders, analytics, and handle support tickets through the admin dashboard.
validation_criteria: Successful user registration and login with secure token handling and password encryption.
Proper CRUD operations on restaurants and menus with validation and authorization.
Shopping cart correctly adds, updates, and removes items with state persistence.
Orders correctly created, updated, and displayed to users and restaurants.
Payment transactions processed securely through Chapa with callbacks handled.
Admin panel reflects real-time data and allows management actions as intended.
Search and filtering yield appropriate results for restaurants and menu items.
Security features like rate limiting, input validation, and authentication prevent unauthorized access and attacks.
Promo codes correctly apply discounts and validate usage.
Application UI components correctly render across devices and workflows without errors.
